p: The search strategies were devised in a way to minimise the possible overlap between the datasets on SARS, MERS and Covid-19 and to disentangle the three datasets from one another to the most possible extent. Preliminary inspection of the literature on each three topics determined a set of distinct keywords that would return the target literature with reasonable specificity and sensitivity. In each search, key terms associated with the other literatures were combined with the Boolean operator “AND NOT” in order to avoid the overlap.
